title: Avengers: The Contest TPB (Trade Paperback)
description: "I am the Grandmaster! Never  in a thousand games on a thousand worlds  have I quit the table ere the game was through!" Marvel's first miniseries  an event so big it required every hero Earth has! Time and again  the Grandmaster sets heroes against heroes in cosmic games with billions of lives at stake! Daredevil vs. Iron Fist! Captain America vs. Mockingbird! Iron Man vs. She-Hulk! Black Knight vs. Moon Knight! Wolverine vs. Black Panther! Thor vs. Wonder Man! Plus: Bucky, Mar-Vell, Dracula, Drax,  the Green Goblin,  the Red Guardian and so many more! Collecting CONTEST OF CHAMPIONS #1-3,  WEST COAST AVENGERS ANNUAL #2 and AVENGERS ANNUAL (1967) #16.
